title: Ticket #4470: Window's crash/reboot looses jobs from queue - schedd restart
description: Raytheon describes consistent queue corruption upon rebooting a machine with a schedd even with no jobs which prevents the schedd from starting up. Wile exploring this and rebooting my windows machine 4 sleep forever jobs were classified with exit codes of 15 and job complete status when the schedd was shut down abrubtly by a reboot.
remarks:
2014-Aug-14 11:31:15 by bt:
We believe its a race condition where windows shoots a running job before we can preserve the running job for when we restart.
